body_html: FWIW, I found that simply applying regular dropout to the c tensor in the GRUCell gives good results, as suggested by the paper linked above. Obviously this meant modifying the GRUCell. I am not sure how to do it in the wrapper.
body_text: FWIW, I found that simply applying regular dropout to the c tensor in the GRUCell gives good results, as suggested by the paper linked above.   Obviously this meant modifying the GRUCell.  I am not sure how to do it in the wrapper.
body: FWIW, I found that simply applying regular dropout to the c tensor in the GRUCell gives good results, as suggested by the paper linked above.   Obviously this meant modifying the GRUCell.  I am not sure how to do it in the wrapper.
